name: places/ChIJEZYEq6H2wokRCY9HnPdIY_0
formattedAddress: 435 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 435 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10033-3527, USA

originalText.text: I really don’t understand how this practice gets good reviews. Maybe friends or relatives are posting good reviews. My parents have been patients for many years. That being said they have missed several diagnosis with BOTH OF MY PARENTS. Since I am fortunate enough to work in the healthcare field I flew my parents to Texas to see real doctors that care about their patients. Both of my parent are very ill and just a few diagnostic imaging referrals would have found the problem with my parents. They never pick up the phone. The diagnostic facility faxed reports of the results to two fax numbers given by the staff but when I called today the clinic coordinator said they haven’t received any information. I believe Dr. Pena doesn’t work there any more which might be the best thing for that practice. I will definitely be reaching out to the medical board about the physician and facility.  Growing up in Washington Heights we figure our Latinos doctors would take better care of their community but it’s sad that’s not the case. And Mr. Coordinator i did not appreciate your sarcastic laugh over the phone I bet you wouldn’t be laughing if it was your parents. Your practice deserves a ZERO reviews a single star is to much for your facility.

originalText.text: This place deserves ZERO stars! I'm changing my mother to a new doctor. Throughout the years she has ALWAYS had issues with this practice and their main doctor Dr. Goris. It's impossible to get through to them on the phone, its always leave a voicemail no matter what! When by chance you do get someone on the phone they sound so miserable, low energy and unprofessional. Staff is such a disgrace! My mother has major back pain and this doctor has just given her medication after medication, no referral to a more comprehensive examination, no referral to another specialist, no referral to physical therapy. Every month she gets unnecessary refills for medication she doesn't even take anymore! I'll be reporting this practice! This doctor should not be practicing medicine, he's taking advantage of his own community.

originalText.text: Dr. Jose Goris is an exceptional doctor! He is brilliant and caring. He is the top doctor in Upper Manhattan (Washington Heights) and the Bronx. If you want a cursory visit with a doctor who will spend 30 seconds with you and then rush you out the door, go somewhere else because doctor Goris takes his time getting to know you as a person and learning your entire medical history so that he can best help you. He actually loves his job and is in it to save lives. Doctor Goris makes you feel like you are part of the family, which is a long-lost trait and very hard to find nowadays.

originalText.text: I changed my primary to Dr. Goris I'm so satisfied he is a very concerned dr.toward patients condition and how to start Treatment and explain y I also am cause he was my dad's doc. And now his experience has grown thank u Dr goris

originalText.text: He is such a caring doctor. Some might complain about the waiting time but honestly he takes his time with each and every patient. He is very caring and he really makes me feel like he really cares about my health and well being. If you live uptown and want a caring doctor he’s the one. He has saved so many lives I swear he’s doing God’s work.
